title: Shoot for the Moon
description: Shoot for the Moon is a thought-provoking journey of self-discovery, inspiration and self-mastery. The experience of the book will shine a light on those aspects that both challenge and inspire your life experience.This book is for those who care deeply about the quality of their life and achieving the wholeness of success both personally and professionally. It’s a collection of insights that address what defines you, overcoming self-imposed limitations and shifting perceptions to infinite possibilities.Life mastery is solely a function of one’s personal commitment and investment in attaining a life experience without limitation. If you share in the spirit of this message and seek to expand your capacity to a more impactful and meaningful life, this book lays the groundwork to attain just that.Above all, it is an invitation to adopt a “Shoot for the Moon” frame of mind in pursuing your highest good and embracing the life that is awaiting your engagement. The choice is yours and yours alone. Choose well.
author: Hope St. Amant
